game.name: SiIas Adventure
game.desc:
The Atari Lynx is getting a new First-Person dungeon crawler called Silas Adventure. You take control of the hero who has amnesia and a sword. That is all you need in an unfamiliar dungeon with skeletons roaming the halls.
Take up the adventure to learn more about this mysterious world.

game.name: Super Nutmeg
game.desc:
Super Nutmeg is an enhanced version of Photon Storm's HTML5 game Nutmeg. The original game is a one button jump and run game. You can find this original game playing the classic mode.
What is so Super on Super Nutmeg? Super Nutmeg is a sidescrolling jump and run game. Resuce your buddies, fight the evil kidnapper, collect stars, earn powers and avoid enemies at any cost. As usual, a simple but yet slightly entertaining story. Powerups will make you climb ropes and jump higher, which can be of advantage in later levels and fighting the boss.
